# Goodreads Data

## Description of Data

This Data is "Best Books (10k) Multi-Genre Data" data set from Kaggle. It's from the "Books That Everyone Should Read At Least Once" list on Goodreads.

**Title of Book**: The Label for the data.

**Author:** A category.

**A Description of the Book**.

**Genres**: Categories that I want to analyze.

**Average Rating:** Quantitative.

**Number of Ratings:** Quantitative.

**URL:**

## The Data

```{r}
#| output: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
BOOKS <- read.csv("goodreads_data.csv")
head(BOOKS)
```
